Public Satisfaction.issue: High overall public dissatisfaction with government services
Public Satisfaction.root_cause: Multiple service weaknesses across different service quality dimensions
Public Satisfaction.impact: Low public confidence and negative perception of government performance
actions: Analyze negative feedback to identify common problem patterns
Create a comprehensive service improvement action plan
Conduct customer service and values training for all staff
Monitor service performance regularly and apply corrective actions

Service Quality.issue: Slow response to citizen requests and inquiries
Service Quality.root_cause: Lack of response time standards, monitoring, and workload prioritization
Service Quality.impact: Delays frustrate citizens and reduce trust in government efficiency

Information Dissemination.issue: Low public awareness of the Citizen’s Charter
Information Dissemination.impact: Citizens are unaware of rights and service standards
actions: Publish on website and social media
